DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Pharmacodynamic Study Once-Daily Twice-Daily Dosing With Canagliflozin Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label ( volunteer know name treatment assign ) , single-center study canagliflozin ( JNJ-28431754 ) healthy adult volunteer . Canagliflozin ( Sodium-Glucose Cotransporter 2 inhibitor ) currently development low blood sugar level patient type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) . Patients Cohort 1 randomize receive Treatment A ( one 300-mg tablet orally , mouth [ PO ] daily 5 day ) follow 10 day later Treatment B ( one 50-mg one 100-mg tablet PO twice daily 5 day ) Treatment B follow Treatment A . Patients Cohort 2 randomize receive Treatment C ( one 100-mg tablet PO daily 5 day ) follow 10 day later Treatment D ( one 50-mg tablet PO twice daily 5 day ) Treatment D follow Treatment C .
